languages.text: "Хватит. И вы это знаете... Этого вы и боитесь". {n}Спокойный голос Кассии заставляет труппу Арлекинов встрепенуться, но она этого не замечает — ее взгляд направлен лишь на вас.{/n} "Я больше не желаю бояться, {name}. Служить Дому, что предавал меня из раза в раз. Или использовал как пустышку. Послушную замену Тисифоны. Я... ухожу. Вместе с вами, {name}. И отрекаюсь от титула новатора".

traits.locale_text: "Хватит. И вы это знаете... Этого вы и боитесь". {n}Спокойный голос Кассии заставляет труппу Арлекинов встрепенуться, но она этого не замечает — ее взгляд направлен лишь на вас.{/n} "Я больше не желаю бояться, {name}. Служить Дому, что предавал меня из раза в раз. Или использовал как пустышку. Послушную замену Тисифоны. Я... ухожу. Вместе с вами, {name}. И отрекаюсь от титула новатора".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I do. As you are well aware. It is what you all fear." {n}Cassia's calm voice causes the Harlequin Troupe to tense, but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."
languages.original_text: "Хватит. И вы это знаете... Этого вы и боитесь". {n}Спокойный голос Кассии заставляет труппу Арлекинов встрепенуться, но она этого не замечает — ее взгляд направлен лишь на вас.{/n} "Я больше не желаю бояться, {name}. Служить Дому, что предавал меня из раза в раз. Или использовал как пустышку. Послушную замену Тисифоны. Я... ухожу. Вместе с вами, {name}. И отрекаюсь от титула новатора".

Or serve the House that betrayed me time and time again. Used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あるわ。よくご存知でしょう。あなたたち皆が恐れる力を」{n}カシアの穏やかな声にハーレクィンのトルゥプを緊張させるが、カシアは意に介さず、あなただけを見つめている。{/n}「あたくしはもう、怯えたくはありません、{name}様。あたくしを裏切った家門に再び仕える気もありません。あたくしを魂なき操り人形として扱った家門なんて。従順なティシフォンの代替品として扱った家門なんて。あたくしは…行きます。{name}様、あなたと共に。ノベイターの肩書きを捨てます」
languages.original_text: "I do. As you are well aware. It is what you all fear." {n}Cassia's calm voice causes the Harlequin Troupe to tense, but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: 「あるわ。よくご存知でしょう。あなたたち皆が恐れる力を」{n}カシアの穏やかな声にハーレクィンのトルゥプを緊張させるが、カシアは意に介さず、あなただけを見つめている。{/n}「あたくしはもう、怯えたくはありません、{name}様。あたくしを裏切った家門に再び仕える気もありません。あたくしを魂なき操り人形として扱った家門なんて。従順なティシフォンの代替品として扱った家門なんて。あたくしは…行きます。{name}様、あなたと共に。ノベイターの肩書きを捨てます」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我有这样的力量，你们也很清楚，所以你们才这么恐惧。”{n}卡西娅的声音很平静，丑角剧团所有成员都变得紧张起来，但她却并没有留意其他人。此刻，她的眼中只有你。{/n}“我不想再害怕下去了，{name}，我也不想再为我的家族效力了。他们一次次背叛我，把我当成没有灵魂的傀儡，把我看做提西福涅忠顺的继承人。我要……走了，我要和你一起走，{name}。我在此放弃我的大族长之位。”
languages.original_text: "I do. As you are well aware. It is what you all fear." {n}Cassia's calm voice causes the Harlequin Troupe to tense, but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: “我有这个力量，而你们也很清楚。所以你们才这么恐惧。”{n}卡西娅平静的声音，让丑角剧团所有人都紧张起来。但她并没有留意其他人。此刻，她的眼中只有你。{/n}“我不想再害怕下去了，{name}，我也不想再为我的家族效力了。他们一次次背叛我，把我当成没有灵魂的傀儡，把我看做提西福涅忠顺的继承人。我要……走了，我要和你一起走，{name}。我在此放弃我的大族长之位。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Oh que si. Et vous le savez très bien. C'est d'ailleurs ce que vous craignez au plus haut point, tous. » {n}La voix pourtant calme de Cassia provoque une certaine tension dans la troupe des arlequins, mais elle ne semble même pas s'en rendre compte tant elle n'a d'yeux que pour vous.{/n} « Je ne veux plus avoir peur, {name}. Je ne veux plus servir la maison qui m'a trahie à de multiples reprises. Qui s'est servie de moi comme d'une marionnette. Et qui ne voyait en moi que la docile remplaçante de Tisiphone. Je... pars. Avec vous, {name}. Je renonce au titre de Novator. »
languages.original_text: "I do. As you are well aware. It is what you all fear." {n}Cassia's calm voice causes the Harlequin Troupe to tense, but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: « Oh que si. Et vous le savez très bien. C'est d'ailleurs ce que vous craignez au plus haut point, tous. » {n}La voix pourtant calme de Cassia provoque une certaine tension dans la troupe des arlequins, mais elle ne semble même pas s'en rendre compte tant elle n'a d'yeux que pour vous.{/n} « Je ne veux plus avoir peur, {name}. Je ne veux plus servir la maison qui m'a trahie à de multiples reprises. Qui s'est servie de moi comme d'une marionnette. Et qui ne voyait en moi que la docile remplaçante de Tisiphone. Je... pars. Avec vous, {name}. Je renonce au titre de Novator. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Lo tengo. Ya lo sabéis. Es tal y como os teméis». {n}La voz tranquila de Cassia hace que la compañía de Arlequines se tense, pero ella no lo ve, pues sus ojos están fijos en ti.{/n} «No deseo seguir viviendo con miedo, {name}. Ni tampoco servir a la casa que me ha traicionado una vez tras otra, que me ha utilizado como una marioneta sin voluntad, como una sustituta sumisa de Tisiphone. Voy a... abandonarla. Me marcho con usted, {name}. Renuncio a mi título de Novator».
languages.original_text: "I do. As you are well aware. It is what you all fear." {n}Cassia's calm voice causes the Harlequin Troupe to tense, but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: «Lo tengo. Ya lo sabéis. Es tal y como os teméis». {n}La voz tranquila de Cassia capta la atención de la compañía de Arlequines, pero ella no lo ve, pues sus ojos están fijos en ti.{/n} «No deseo seguir viviendo con miedo, {name}. Ni tampoco servir a la casa que me ha traicionado una vez tras otra, que me ha utilizado como una marioneta sin voluntad, como una sustituta sumisa de Tisiphone. Voy a... abandonarla. Me marcho con usted, {name}. Renuncio a mi título de Novator».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Wie Ihr nur zu gut wisst. Es ist das, was Ihr alle fürchtet." {n}Cassias ruhige Stimme lässt das Harlekin-Ensemble unruhig werden, was sie aber gar nicht bemerkt. Sie hat nur Augen für dich.{/n} "Ich will keine Angst mehr haben, {name}. Und dem Haus nicht mehr dienen, dass mich wieder und wieder betrogen hat. Das mich als seelenlose Puppe benutzt hat. Als gehorsamen Ersatz für Tisiphone. Ich ... gehe. Ich gehe mit Euch, {name}. Ich lege meinen Titel als Novatorin ab."
languages.original_text: "I do. As you are well aware. It is what you all fear." {n}Cassia's calm voice causes the Harlequin Troupe to tense, but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Wie Ihr nur zu gut wisst. Es ist das, was Ihr alle fürchtet." {n}Cassias ruhige Stimme lässt das Harlekin-Ensemble munter werden, was sie aber gar nicht bemerkt. Sie hat nur Augen für dich.{/n} "Ich will keine Angst mehr haben, {name}. Und dem Haus nicht mehr dienen, dass mich wieder und wieder betrogen hat. Mich als seelenlose Puppe benutzt. Als gehorsamen Ersatz für Tisiphone. Ich ... gehe. Ich gehe mit Euch, {name}. Ich lege meinen Titel als Novatorin ab."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Var. Bunun sen de farkındasın. Hepiniz bundan korkuyorsunuz." {n}Cassia'nın sakin ses tonu yüzünden Arleken Kumpanyası gerilse de Cassia, gözleri sadece seni gördüğünden bunu fark etmiyor.{/n} "Artık korkmak istemiyorum {name}. Bana defalarca ihanet eden Hane'ye hizmet etmek de istemiyorum. Artık Tisiphone'ye vekâlet eden, itaatkâr ve ruhsuz kukla rolünü üstlenmek istemiyorum. Ben... Gidiyorum. Seninle geleceğim {name}. Rota Reisliği makamından feragat ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I do. As you are well aware. It is what you all fear." {n}Cassia's calm voice causes the Harlequin Troupe to tense, but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: "Var. Bunun sen de farkındasın. Hepiniz bundan korkuyorsunuz." {n}Cassia'nın sakin ses tonu yüzünden Arleken Kumpanyası gerilse de, Cassia bunu fark etmiyor çünkü gözleri sadece sana dönmüş durumda.{/n} "Artık korkmak istemiyorum {name}. Bana defalarca ihanet eden Haneye hizmet etmek de istemiyorum. Artık Tisiphone'ye vekâleten itaatkâr ve ruhsuz bir kukla rolünü üstlenmek istemiyorum. Yani... Gidiyorum. Seninle gidiyorum {name}. Rota Reisi makamından feragat ediyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
